decision_conditions: The extent of changes to the scheme would go beyond the scope of a non-material minor amendment. Reducing the depth of the privacy screens to the rear staircase would require the variation of condition 8 of P1743.20, which states that: "Prior to the first occupation of the proposed flats, 1.8m high privacy screens shall be fitted to the rear staircase hereby approved in accordance with Drawing No.'s P502 and P503 and shall be permanently retained thereafter".
There is a reasonable expectation that neighbouring properties would be consulted on this matter. As such the alterations shown cannot be considered as non-material and require a S73 application.
description:
Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1743.20 dated 09/04/2021 to reduce the depth of the privacy screens.
(Ground floor rear extensions together with reformation of the approved external staircase and walk way at flat roof level to facilitate access to self-contained flats at upper parts. Change of use of ground floor (116) from B1 to A1/B1, change of use of ground floor (114) from sui generis to A1/B1.  Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include rear dormer and 2 front roof lights to allow for conversion of existing flat into 1 x 1-bed flat and 1 x studio at 114 and 1 x 1 bed flat and 1 x studio at 116.)
